format:
<textformat tabstops='[5,150,214]'><font size='0'>.</font><tab><font color='#FF9900'>{{vehicle_name}}</font><tab>Reload:<tab>{{gun_reload_equip}} sec</textformat>
<textformat tabstops='[5,54,150,214,246,279]'><font size='0'>.</font><tab>View:<tab>{{vision_radius}} mt<tab>Shell Type: <tab>  {{shell_type_1}}<tab>  {{shell_type_2}}<tab>  {{shell_type_3}}</textformat>
<textformat tabstops='[5,54,80,105,150,214,246,279]'><font size='0'>.</font><tab>Torret:<tab>{{armor_turret_front}}<tab>{{armor_turret_side}}<tab>{{armor_turret_back}}<tab>Av. Damage:<tab>{{shell_damage_1}}<tab>{{shell_damage_2}}<tab>{{shell_damage_3}}</textformat>
<textformat tabstops='[5,54,80,105,150,214,246,279]'><font size='0'>.</font><tab>Chassis:<tab>{{armor_hull_front}}<tab>{{armor_hull_side}}<tab>{{armor_hull_back}}<tab>Piercing:<tab>{{shell_power_1}}<tab>{{shell_power_2}}<tab>{{shell_power_3}}</textformat>
